features: 5.5-fluid ounces of Neutrogena Oil-Free Liquid Eye Makeup Remover Solution to gently remove eye makeup without pulling or tugging
The effective & gentle makeup removing solution is ophthalmologist-tested and developed by dermatologists to be safe for contact lens wearers and gentle for sensitive face and eye area

To use the eye makeup remover, shake well and apply with a cotton pad on closed eyelids, then gently rinse with warm water. These cleansing wipes are the perfect addition to your at-home skincare routine
body.description: Use the Neutrogena Oil-Free Eye Makeup Remover Solution to help gently remove makeup from around your eyes. This dual-phase lightweight liquid removes even waterproof eye makeup, including mascara and eyeliner, without any tugging or pulling. Because the formula is oil-free, it does not leave behind any oily residue. Aloe and cucumber extracts in the makeup remover soothe skin and leave it feeling cool and refreshed. This non-greasy & oil-free makeup removing formula is ophthalmologist-tested and safe for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers as part of their at-home skincare routine

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Oil-Free Eye Makeup Remover Remove eye makeup with this gentle dual phase formula. It activates when shaken to gently whisk away eye makeup - even waterproof mascara. Because the formula is 100 percent oil-free, it does not leave behind any oily residue. Aloe and cucumber extracts in the makeup remover soothe skin and leave it feeling cool and refreshed. This non-greasy makeup removing formula is ophthalmologist-tested and safe for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers.

Healthy-Looking Skin Routine Cleanse Try cleansing your skin of makeup with Neutrogena Oil-Free Eye Makeup Remover. Treat Toner and serum can help prep and treat your skin. Moisturize Apply your favorite moisturizer to hydrate and treat your skin. Protect Consider sunscreen, if your moisturizer doesn't contain any, to protect your skin against the damaging effects of the sun, when used with other sun protection measures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, even on waterproof mascara
reviews.reviewText: It works! I can get off my waterproof mascara easily. It leaves a residue that I definitely need to use a face cleanser to get off, but that's fine. It does make my eye area a little sensitive afterwards, but I like that it's oil free. I recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best eye makeup remover
reviews.reviewText: It works so well and never leaves oil or any residue. Mascara comes right off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best eye makeup remover
reviews.reviewText: I like the convenience of wipes but in reality when I'm wearing mascara and I want it off this is the only remover that I like to use it's so thorough and I don't have to scrub my eyes to get the mascara off it's gentle and effective and I would recommend it to anyone who doesn't mind having a bottle using it with cotton balls

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, gets the job done quickly.
reviews.reviewText: Happy with the brand and ingredients, works well and quickly. Not a lot is needed to get the job done-excellent on tough mascara!! Recommend using thick disposable makeup remover pads when traveling that can also be used for removing nail polish with separate remover. But if you want to be more eco friendly at home, have a couple of dedicated wash clothes and that would do the trick as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Will not remove mascara easily
reviews.reviewText: Good points:GENTLE--definitely is. . I shook the bottle up because this is a biphasic solution, then wetted a cotton pad and wiped off eyeshadow, mascara and eyebrow powder. No irritation and even though I have sensitive skin and eyes, it felt great.I got a good schmear of the eye shadow on my cotton pad but....not the mascara. (Essence False Eyelash Effect.) I could see the color of my eyeshadow but no inky streak from the black mascara.Bad points:Until I washed my face well AFTER using this remover, and got rings of mascara below my eye, the two or three swipes with that cotton pad and remover did NOT touch my mascara. My mascara is not waterproof mascara, either. So truly, the first wipes of the cotton pad and Neutrogena Gentle Oil-Free remover did not touch my mascara AT ALL.I wetted another pad and it easily took off the rest of the mascara and I then washed my face to remove the remover (again). It did a good job removing the mascara residue.I'd buy this again anyway because I like that I woke up the next day without eye irritation but you have to work at removing mascara. Since the remover is so gentle, and I hate waking up with irritated eyes, I'd put up with using AFTER I wash my face to remove the residue of makeup left behind and then rinse again. If I were to find another that is as gentle but more effective, I'd switch.NOT recommended, therefore, for waterproof mascara.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best price
reviews.reviewText: Thank you for good price. I love this product since years

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well without the need for rubbing.
reviews.reviewText: It takes off my mascara easily. My previous brand was thick and required a lot of rubbing before anything came off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great eye makeup remover!
reviews.reviewText: I couldn't imagine wearing makeup without this remover! Instantly removes waterproof eyeliner and mascara. No more black eyes and stained up wash clothes!
Es una muy buena marca y el desmaquillante no es la excepción. No reseca y limpia muy bien.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Removes waterproof mascara quickly. Does not leave you with oily misty eyes.
Removes makeup both face and eyes effectively. No sticky feeling. Face need to be washedafter application though. Will definitely buy again
